attributes.action: stop Banks/Building Societys charging extortionate penalty charges for arrears etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lenders currently charge up to £135 a month if your mortgage payment is late. Many people are now falling into arrears due to interest rate hikes and these charges are totally scandalous and in no way relect the actual cost to the lender. Seems that they can simply charge whatever they like and it is time this was stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
